original_title: Three people dead in fatal accident in Warakapola
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Three people, including a teenage boy, died in a fatal motor accident in Thulhiriya, Warakapola.
The accident was the result of a head-on collision between a three-wheeler and a tipper truck.
The deceased were traveling in the three-wheeler, and they were identified as a father (40), mother (39), and their 13-year-old son.
The driver of the Tipper Truck was arrested, and an investigation is underway.
